revised_title: Alister Clavering Hardy: A Life of Natural History and Religious Exploration
tldr: The article is a biography of Alister Clavering Hardy, a prominent zoologist and religious thinker. Hardy made significant contributions to the fields of zoology, oceanography, and natural theology. He is best known for his work on the continuous plankton recorder and his research on the Southern Ocean. Hardy's life was marked by his dedication to natural history and his exploration of religious experiences, which led him to establish the Religious Experience Research Unit.
